title: I put $50 into Bitcoin in 2022 and watched it crash and rally - here's its worth today
contentSnippet: My money took a beating when Bitcoin crashed, burned, and gained. Do I wish I'd sold, or am I glad I held? Either way, it's been a wild ride.
content: My money took a beating when Bitcoin crashed, burned, and gained. Do I wish I'd sold, or am I glad I held? Either way, it's been a wild ride.
